lyrics:
16 contributorsthe good life lyricsverse 1
the good life is what i need
too many people stepping over me
the only thing thats been on my mind
is the one thing i need before i die

all i need is to have a good time

i dont really know who i am
its time for me to take a stand
i need a change and i need it fast
i know that any day could be the last
